algorithm.name: AZUREFORM
algorithm.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform form recognition in documents and images.

properties.name: ACS_URL
properties.description: URL for the Azure Cognitive Services Endpoint. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: ACS_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY
properties.description: Azure Cognitive Services subscription key. Can also be provided by an environment variable with the same name. If both are provided, the job property is used.

properties.name: MERGE_LINES
properties.description: Whether or not to combine detected lines into a single detection. When true, all lines within a given page will be combined into one detection output. Disabling this property can result in an excessive number of detections.

properties.name: INCLUDE_TEXT_DETAILS
properties.description: Whether or not to include text lines and element references in the result. When false, custom models will not output raw text results.

actions.name: AZURE FORM RECOGNIZER DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform optical character recognition.

tasks.name: AZURE FORM RECOGNIZER DETECTION TASK
tasks.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform optical character recognition.

pipelines.name: AZURE FORM RECOGNIZER DETECTION PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Uses Azure Cognitive Services to perform optical character recognition.
